metadata.description: Specifies the name of the Azure Machine Learning workspace which will hold this datastore target.
The name of the datastore, case insensitive, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscore
Optional : The username of the database user to access the database. Either provide username & password or valid credential of a service principal.
Optional : The password of the database user to access the database. Either provide username & password or valid credential of a service principal.
Optional : The service principal Tenant ID. This is ignored if both username & password are provided.
Optional : The service principal/application ID. This is ignored if both username & password are provided.
Optional : The service principal's secret. This is ignored if both username & password are provided.
Optional : Authority url used to authenticate the user. Defaults to https://login.microsoftonline.com
Optional : Determines what operations will be performed on the database. Defaults to https://database.windows.net/
Optional : The endpoint of the sql server. Defaults to database.windows.net.
Optional : If set to true, the call will skip datastore validation. Defaults to false
The location of the Azure Machine Learning Workspace.
